duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide clinical anesthesia care to pediatric patients at Ann & Robert H. Lurie Children’s Hospital of Chicago, as well as Radiology and Hematology-Oncology at Northwestern Memorial Hospital & the Proton Center.
Participate in the education programs of the Department and Medical School, including teaching and education of students and house staff.
Actively contribute to the research programs of the department.

education_certification.credential: American Board of Anesthesiology Certification or board-eligible
